member.name: D2D1_UNIT_MODE
member.summary: Specifies how units in Direct2D will be interpreted.

member.name: D2D1_UNIT_MODE.D2D1_UNIT_MODE_DIPS
member.summary: Units will be interpreted as device-independent pixels (1/96").

member.name: D2D1_UNIT_MODE.D2D1_UNIT_MODE_PIXELS
member.summary: Units will be interpreted as pixels.
